title: Package general use tutorial
text: package installation, use remotes package: installation, load package. also use functions dplyr package.
code: remotes::install_github("rfsaldanha/opendenguedata") library(opendenguedata) library(dplyr) #>  #> Attaching package: 'dplyr' #> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from 'package:base': #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union

title: Package general use tutorial
text: OpenDengueData project presents dengue data three different extracts: national, spatial temporal. Use read_data function download read data one extracts.
code: res <- read_data(extract = "temporal", as_data_frame = TRUE, showProgress = FALSE)  dplyr::glimpse(res) #> Rows: 390,627 #> Columns: 14 #> $ adm_0_name          <chr> "AFGHANISTAN", "AFGHANISTAN", "AFGHANISTAN", "AFGH… #> $ adm_1_name          <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA… #> $ adm_2_name          <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA… #> $ full_name           <chr> "AFGHANISTAN", "AFGHANISTAN", "AFGHANISTAN", "AFGH… #> $ ISO_A0              <chr> "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "… #> $ FAO_GAUL_code       <int> 1011446, 1011446, 1011446, 1011446, 1011446, 10114… #> $ RNE_iso_code        <chr> "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "… #> $ calendar_start_date <date> 2021-01-03, 2021-01-10, 2021-01-17, 2021-01-24, 2… #> $ calendar_end_date   <date> 2021-01-09, 2021-01-16, 2021-01-23, 2021-01-30, 2… #> $ Year                <int> 2021, 2021, 2021, 2021, 2021, 2021, 2021, 2021, 20… #> $ dengue_total        <int> 101, 151, 201, 202, 100, 251, 101, 61, 99, 112, 70… #> $ S_res               <chr> "Admin0", "Admin0", "Admin0", "Admin0", "Admin0", … #> $ T_res               <chr> "Week", "Week", "Week", "Week", "Week", "Week", "W… #> $ sourceID            <chr> "WHO/EMRO-ALL-2016/2021-Y01", "WHO/EMRO-ALL-2016/2…

title: Package general use tutorial
text: read_data function as_data_frame arguments defaults FALSE. means package return Arrow Table object. advantage format data directly loaded computer memory download. particular useful dataset big fit memory. recommendated set argument FALSE filter rows use dplyr verbs load data memory. collect function internally reponsible prepare send query Arrow Table object collects results, returning tibble object.
code: res <- read_data(extract = "temporal", as_data_frame = FALSE, showProgress = FALSE) %>%   filter(Year == 2021) %>%   collect()  glimpse(res) #> Rows: 17,898 #> Columns: 14 #> $ adm_0_name          <chr> "AFGHANISTAN", "AFGHANISTAN", "AFGHANISTAN", "AFGH… #> $ adm_1_name          <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA… #> $ adm_2_name          <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA… #> $ full_name           <chr> "AFGHANISTAN", "AFGHANISTAN", "AFGHANISTAN", "AFGH… #> $ ISO_A0              <chr> "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "… #> $ FAO_GAUL_code       <int> 1011446, 1011446, 1011446, 1011446, 1011446, 10114… #> $ RNE_iso_code        <chr> "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "AFG", "… #> $ calendar_start_date <date> 2021-01-03, 2021-01-10, 2021-01-17, 2021-01-24, 2… #> $ calendar_end_date   <date> 2021-01-09, 2021-01-16, 2021-01-23, 2021-01-30, 2… #> $ Year                <int> 2021, 2021, 2021, 2021, 2021, 2021, 2021, 2021, 20… #> $ dengue_total        <int> 101, 151, 201, 202, 100, 251, 101, 61, 99, 112, 70… #> $ S_res               <chr> "Admin0", "Admin0", "Admin0", "Admin0", "Admin0", … #> $ T_res               <chr> "Week", "Week", "Week", "Week", "Week", "Week", "W… #> $ sourceID            <chr> "WHO/EMRO-ALL-2016/2021-Y01", "WHO/EMRO-ALL-2016/2…

title: Package general use tutorial
text: vector columns names may presented subset dataset.
code: res <- opendenguedata::read_data(extract = "spatial", as_data_frame = TRUE,                                   showProgress = FALSE,                                   columns = c("full_name", "calendar_start_date",                               "calendar_end_date", "dengue_total"))                    dplyr::glimpse(res) #> Rows: 383,935 #> Columns: 4 #> $ full_name           <chr> "AFGHANISTAN", "AFGHANISTAN", "AFGHANISTAN", "AFGH… #> $ calendar_start_date <date> 2021-01-03, 2021-01-10, 2021-01-17, 2021-01-24, 2… #> $ calendar_end_date   <date> 2021-01-09, 2021-01-16, 2021-01-23, 2021-01-30, 2… #> $ dengue_total        <int> 101, 151, 201, 202, 100, 251, 101, 61, 99, 112, 70…

title: Package general use tutorial
text: read_data function download data OpenDengue project repository. avoid repeatedly downloads, cache argument creates temporary folder inside computer download data. first download, file cached folder referenced next runs function. force new download refresh package cache, set argument FALSE.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Saldanha R (2023). opendenguedata: Download data opendengue project. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://rfsaldanha.github.io/opendenguedata/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {opendenguedata: Download data from opendengue project},   author = {Raphael Saldanha},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://rfsaldanha.github.io/opendenguedata/}, }

title: Download data from opendengue project
text: R package download data OpenDengue project repository. possible download data project, using cached updated versions select columns subset prior reading data memory.

title: Download data from opendengue project
text: Read data temporal extract. Read data spatial extract return selected columns.
code: res <- opendenguedata::read_data(extract = "temporal", as_data_frame = TRUE)  dplyr::glimpse(res) res <- opendenguedata::read_data(extract = "spatial", as_data_frame = TRUE,                   columns = c("full_name", "calendar_start_date", "calendar_end_date", "dengue_total"))  dplyr::glimpse(res)

title: Download file from url — download_file
code: download_file(   file_url = parent.frame()$file_url,   showProgress = parent.frame()$showProgress,   cache = parent.frame()$cache )

title: Download file from url — download_file
text: file_url String. url. showProgress Logical. cache Logical.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.

what: Read data from OpenDengue github repository — read_data
title: Read data from OpenDengue github repository — read_data
Read data from OpenDengue github repository — read_data
code: read_data(   extract,   columns = NULL,   as_data_frame = FALSE,   showProgress = TRUE,   cache = TRUE )

title: Read data from OpenDengue github repository — read_data
text: extract character. national, spatial temporal columns character vector. Columns names subset. as_data_frame logical. TRUE returns tibble object. FALSE returns Arrow Table object. Defaults FALSE. showProgress logical. Show download bar progress console. cache logical. Use cached data first download.

title: Read data from OpenDengue github repository — read_data
Read data from OpenDengue github repository — read_data
